cabacafe-f00d-4b1b-9b1b-1b1b1b1b1b1.name: Firmware Revision String
cabacafe-f00d-4b1b-9b1b-1b1b1b1b1b1.description: Firmware revision string of the device

c0dec0fe-cafe-a1ca-992f-1b1b1b1b1b1b.name: Unix time synchronization
c0dec0fe-cafe-a1ca-992f-1b1b1b1b1b1b.description: Time in unix ms sent to peripheral for time synchronization

0badf00d-cafe-4b1b-9b1b-2c931b1b1b1b.name: Total Sensor Data
0badf00d-cafe-4b1b-9b1b-2c931b1b1b1b.description: Total size of sensor data in memory (bytes)

f007face-babe-47f5-b542-bbfd9b436872.name: Response Timeout
f007face-babe-47f5-b542-bbfd9b436872.description: Timeout in milliseconds to wait for a connect response after advertising

0badf00d-babe-47f5-b542-bbfd9b436872.name: Sensor Data Read Confirm Bit
0badf00d-babe-47f5-b542-bbfd9b436872.description: Bit to set when a chunk of sensor data has been received by the central. Write 1 to advance the chunk.

cabba6ee-c0de-4414-a6f6-46a397e18422.name: Sensor Data Clear Flash and Disconnect Bit
cabba6ee-c0de-4414-a6f6-46a397e18422.description: Bit to clear the sensor data in flash and disconnect (write 1 to clear)

eeafbeef-cafe-4d3c-a1ca-ae3e7e098a2b.name: Advertising Interval (Global)
eeafbeef-cafe-4d3c-a1ca-ae3e7e098a2b.description: Interval between advertising sessions in milliseconds

babebeef-cafe-4d3c-a1ca-ae3e7e098a2b.name: Advertising Duration
babebeef-cafe-4d3c-a1ca-ae3e7e098a2b.description: Duration of a single advertising session in milliseconds

c0ffee00-babe-4d3c-a1ca-ae3e7e098a2b.name: Advertising Interval (Local)
c0ffee00-babe-4d3c-a1ca-ae3e7e098a2b.description: Interval at which the embedded BLE core advertises (multiples of 0.625ms)
